UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information within the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity. Corresponds to Firebase Authentication user UID.

displayName.description: The user's display name, visible to other users.

photoURL.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

CodeSnippet.title: CodeSnippet
CodeSnippet.description: Represents a single code snippet with AI-enhanced metadata.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CodeSnippet entity.

title.description: The title or name given to the code snippet.

codeContent.description: The actual code content of the snippet.

language.description: The programming language of the snippet (e.g., javascript, python).

aiExplanation.description: An optional AI-generated explanation of what the code does.

authorId.description: Reference to the UserProfile who created this snippet.

authorName.description: The display name of the author (denormalized).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the code snippet was created.

isPublic.description: A flag indicating whether the snippet is publicly visible.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message posted in the global public chat room.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatMessage entity.

senderId.description: Reference to the UserProfile who sent this message.

senderName.description: The display name of the user who sent the message.

senderPhotoURL.description: URL to the profile picture of the user who sent the message.

text.description: The textual content of the chat message.

timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was sent.

/codeSnippets/{snippetId}.description: Stores code snippets with visibility controls.
